parameters: The person in the portrait disappeared, leaving only the black background.
The person in the portrait disappeared, leaving only the black background.
\c[1]He Guilan \c[0]Xiaojuan, hurry up...hurry up and find the passbook!
\c[1]He Guilan \c[0]Ms. Zhang was arrested by the police!

\c[1]He Guilan \c[0]Your father-in-law and I are thinking about paying some people
to meet her again.
\c[1]He Guilan \c[0]This is bad, how can I see Yu in the future!
\c[2]Zhao Xiaojuan \c[0]Mom, don't worry, how much do you need?
\c[1]He Guilan \c[0]It doesn't matter, how much do we have?
\c[2]Zhao Xiaojuan \c[0]Okay, Mom, I'll go get the money now.
This is like an absurd drama...
It feels like my husband has died again.
But I'm not as sad as I was when it happened the first time.
I even feel a sense of relief.
The made-up Tian Yu is like a bottomless pit, but they madly throw their money and energy into it.
I'm afraid of this madness, I'm afraid it'll devour Fangfang.
And now, this madness has finally come to an end...
There are three statues of unknown deities on the pedestal.
\c[1]Zhao Xiaojuan \c[0]Hello Ms. Chen, this is Zhao Xiaojuan.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]Ms. Zhao, Fangfang's transfer has been approved.
\c[1]Zhao Xiaojuan \c[0]Thank you so much, Ms. Chen!
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]I didn't do much, Fangfang is a good kid.
Seeing the outside world will create more opportunities for her development.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]By the way, are Fangfang's grandparents okay with it?
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]Last time you said that her grandparents did not want her to leave the town.
\c[1]Zhao Xiaojuan \c[0]Mhm...\.\.They ended up agreeing with the idea.
\c[1]Zhao Xiaojuan \c[0]Ms. Chen, I also found \c[1]the thing you were looking for\c[0].
I'll send it to you when I get the chance.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]Ms. Zhao, you're a great help.
\c[1]Zhao Xiaojuan \c[0]I'm the one who should thank you. Without your help, Fangfang and I would not be able to leave this place.
\c[1]Zhao Xiaojuan \c[0]Oh, they're coming back soon, keep in touch.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]You disappeared again. I've been looking all over for you...
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]What is 'the thing you were looking for' that Zhao Xiaojuan mentioned?
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]Since you found out, I'll tell you about it.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]When I was a journalist, I came to Qingtan to cover a story...
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]I heard that \c[1]Tian Xiangrong and Wang Jincai were selling cultural relics\c[0].
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]The press asked me to come to Qingtan under the guise of a volunteer teacher.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]After further investigation, I discovered that Tian Xiangrong used to work in a bank.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]He habitually recorded each transaction on his \c[1]ledger\c[0].
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]Tian Xiangrong had some big name clients, so you can guess how important this ledger was to him.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]So you used Fangfang to approach the Tian family.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]Mhm, because of Fangfang, Zhao Xiaojuan and I slowly got to know each other.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]She wanted to take Fangfang out of Qingtan, but Tian Xiangrong and his wife wouldn't allow her.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]So I made a deal with Zhao Xiaojuan. She helped me find the ledger.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]And I promised her that once Tian Xiangrong and his accomplices were arrested...
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]She could leave Qingtan with Fangfang safely.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Ms. Chen, have you got the ledger?
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]Before I could get it, Fangfang's family had been murdered...
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]and I don't know where the ledger is...
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Now many things are starting to make sense.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]Officer, what did you find out from your investigation?
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Sorry, Ms. Chen. Since you've shared so much information,
I don't want to hide anything from you.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]But this isn't the time yet.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]I still need to investigate something important.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]I found information on the bottle that contained the poison, and on the bottle cap
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Perhaps the key to solve the Tian family's case lies in these three fingerprints.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Let's try to find a match for the fingerprints in the Tian family's house.
There are three statues of unknown deities on the pedestal.
There are two paper dolls sitting in the seats in front of the TV.
There are two paper dolls sitting in the seats in front of the TV.
The door is locked and cannot be opened.
The sound of eating is coming from the kitchen.
The door is locked and cannot be opened.
